p: In recent years, our research group has published several 1(2)H-benzo[d][1,2,3]triazole, usually called benzotriazole, derivatives that have shown marked antiviral activity against many viruses [ 15, 16, 17, 18]. The versatile biological behavior of benzotriazole and its derivatives have recently been described in an in-depth review [ 19]. Among these benzotriazole derivatives, the 5,6-dichloro1(2)phenyl-benzotriazole scaffold turned out to be endowed with high activity against several different viruses.
